entry.source: {F812}Weary man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403841}In order to get the demons all over{F801}Tokyo in one place, Tayama decided to{F801}revamp Shibuya...{F801}{F802}He used the Reds to lure all the demons{F801}into one place.{F801}{F802}He claims it was done to contain the{F801}damage to Tokyo. But what about the{F801}damage to us Shibuya locals?{F801}{F802}We got caught up in the redevelopment{F801}scheme to make this region an easier{F801}place to deal Reds...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Weary man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403841}Tayama, Yuriko, I don't care who does it,{F801}just do something about those demons!{F801}{F802}If they really want the Reds, let's just{F801}give 'em all we got!{F801}{F802}Please... Please get these demons away{F801}from me...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Weary man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403841}Come to think of it, those awful kids{F801}were a thorn in our side even before we{F801}had the ceiling to worry about.{F801}{F802}I'm ashamed I made so much commotion{F801}over a few piddly demons...{F801}{F802}Thanks to your heroic effort, champion,{F801}I feel like I can be more positive about{F801}things, like you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Weary man\0{F87A,63}{F813,1,403841}We've lived in a city infested with{F801}demons for years.{F801}{F802}Once Shibuya is back to normal, it'll{F801}attract more of those awful kids.{F801}{F802}...But that's okay. I'll keep my chin{F801}up from now on.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Dreamy woman\0{F87A,80}{F813,1,403122}The guys from the Ashura-kai have been{F801}talking about some stuff "above the{F801}ceiling" recently...{F801}{F802}It never occurred to me there might be{F801}something on the other side of the{F801}ceiling...{F801}{F802}But if whatever's up there is more{F801}comfortable than these underground{F801}districts, I wanna go there...{F801}
